name: BPBleOTA
summary: a swift library aggregating NordicDFU and SMPDFU implement
description: BPBleOTA is a swift library support NordicDFU and SMPDFU for compatible devices. It depended on iOSDFULibrary and iOSMcuManagerLibrary,so can support NordicDFU and SMPDFU by BLE. All things BPBleOTA done are aggregating them and provide a unified interfaceï¼ŒSo it can support pure Objective-C projects which are not supported directly by NordicDFU and SMPDFU
